sentences.english: The dominating green color looks fresh and comforting.
sentences.chinese: 主导的绿色看起来淡雅而宜人。

sentences.english: The gray-green walls, and the walls of fresh silver like box can complement each other.
sentences.chinese: 灰绿色的墙面清新宜人，墙上的银色像框相得益彰。

sentences.english: The Brasilia Plateau in November is verdant in comfortable climate.
sentences.chinese: 11月的巴西利亚高原，草木葱茏，气候宜人。

sentences.english: We went to Hawaii to enjoy the amenity of a warm climate.
sentences.chinese: 我们去了夏威夷，享受到了舒适宜人的温暖气候。

sentences.english: The noise of the stream has a pleasantly somnolent effect.
sentences.chinese: 流水声有宜人的催眠效果。

sentences.english: Agreable. Pleasant character of a well-balanced wine.
sentences.chinese: 一款均衡杰出地葡萄酒所包含地宜人特征。

sentences.english: She invoked a friendly frost to strike her blood.
sentences.chinese: 她用一种宜人的寒霜冻结她的热血。

sentences.english: Pale gold in color with a very fine mousse, the wine is aromatic on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 淡金黄色，似带一抹慕司，此酒芬芳宜人。

sentences.english: All around, there is a cool and welome feeling.
sentences.chinese: 四周是一片清凉宜人的感觉。

sentences.english: The path is landscaped with willows along its two sides.
sentences.chinese: 小路两旁柳树成行，景色宜人。

sentences.english: METHANE-INDUCED SMOG kept the young Earth comfortably warm—but not forever.
sentences.chinese: 甲烷引起的霾使年轻的地球温暖宜人，但好景不常。

sentences.english: Extra care must be taken when swimming in these beautiful places.
sentences.chinese: 在这些景色宜人的地方游泳需格外注意。

sentences.english: The Superior National Forest was nice, real nice.
sentences.chinese: 苏必利尔国家森林风光宜人，的确很宜人。

sentences.english: The Superior National Forest was nice, real nice.
sentences.chinese: 苏必利尔国家森林风光宜人，的确很宜人。

sentences.english: L.A. has a favorable subtropical climate with many white sand beaches.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶有着宜人的亚热带气候以及许多白沙滩。

sentences.english: It is located at the center zone of Yalong Bay, facing south Chinese ocean.
sentences.chinese: 坐落于亚龙海中心地带，面朝南中国海，风景宜人。

definition: (of a location) quiet and secluded/beautiful and secluded
serene and elegant (of a place)/ethereal (of music)
Qingxin county in Qingyuan 清远, Guangdong
(of an area) to have trees with shade-giving foliage/(of a road) to be tree-lined
lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
to penetrate deeply into the heart (idiom)/to gladden the heart/to refresh the mind
